name: China CloudTrust
tag_list: data-center, cloud-computing, virtualization, china, network, internet, it, information-technology, server, storage, cloud, iaas, paas, saas, security
overview:
China CloudTrust is a startup cloud computing services company based in China. The explosive growth of companies that rely heavily on information technology (IT) services and products in China is creating a tremendous need for computing and storage resources. To stay competitive and reduce costs, these companies must find alternatives to costly in-house computing and storage resources that must be constantly maintained, upgraded, and staffed.

China CloudTrust’s cloud data center will provide cost-effective, scalable, and highly-secure solutions by offering on-demand, pay-as-you-go (metered) services to meet the dynamic computing and storage needs of customers

China CloudTrust will offer SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS cloud computing services, as well as traditional IT services such as application hosting. They also offer a cloud storage service for online storage, backup, and synchronization. Storage plans will follow an on-demand, pay-as-you-go model and will offer specific plans for individual consumers, small businesses, and enterprises.
